price: 124. Ken toobokoyti Nabii Huud:Yallak mameesittaanaa? keenik iyye waqdi.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum hūdun alā tattaqūna
